name: DOOMED (itch) (Shot out games)
description:
• 2.5D side scrolling platformer with a twist
  • You are cursed and can not stop shooting
  • Every time you damage the Soul Guides you lose your spirit
  • **BUG** damage to spirits that destroys not registering! Can still be destroyed by the Soul Guides defending themselves
  • Keep an eye on your Soul. Lose all soul and be Doomed!
  • Search and trigger all five soul cubes will allow your escape
  • Find the escape room and break the curse
  • Gamepad Combatible
